An intern signed a confidential document, but used a low RSA exponent for speed. The signature: 0x4a40ae724574afb7bf6e1904b89a74950d60798b3ee39e8fdb437daeb614a7cdb640ea53e57f2b361f4c7365ae5ffe1b23fe9750db0b0b193ddf140977ddcad1. Can you uncover the original message?

Public Key (n, e): (6236988324213804924033738492939285080021734458237520130262235439903321060778740632402383231822607583865424385259343680071631425537025300413965445005199401, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{45am44lt}
ciphertext: 0x4a40ae724574afb7bf6e1904b89a74950d60798b3ee39e8fdb437daeb614a7cdb640ea53e57f2b361f4c7365ae5ffe1b23fe9750db0b0b193ddf140977ddcad1
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (6236988324213804924033738492939285080021734458237520130262235439903321060778740632402383231822607583865424385259343680071631425537025300413965445005199401, 3)
